songs.title: Words
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Take Y
Take the letter
Take it out on the alphabet
Do not ask me why
No more questions
Just accept it for the way it is

[Verse 1]
Words are just words
They get in my way
I can never say what I want to say
Who will understand it anyway?
It is just a waste

Take M
Mmm mmm
It is so lovely, so delicious, it says it all

[Verse 2]
I do not like X
Ex-boyfriends, ex-girlfriends
Exactly what I do not need
Twisting my words so easily

[Verse 3]
Words are just words
They get in my way
See like right now, I want to tell you that I love you
But I do not know how

[Verse 4]
Put the H with the A with the TE
Give its power, you could destroy me
Put the L, with the O with the VE
Give that power and you do not have to say anything

[Interlude]
Words are just words
They get in my way
Bla bla bla bla
Blaaaa

Words are just words
They get in my way
Words are just words
They get in my way

[Outro]
Take B
And just let it be, B
